instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2159: What is A2159? A2159 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3301, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01598..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820-001598 Lid Issue
threads.message:
Hi, 

Got this mac. Ther is no water damage. Customer just updated system and suddenly it started to not wake up sometimes when you open LID, also not turning off when i close it so battery getting 0% and after that it turns on with charger.

My question is where i can find lid sensor on this model?

Is there anything i can check???

The issue is random, not always.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820-001598 Lid Issue
threads.message:
This board (like many others) doesn't have one lid sensor, but two.
Left sensor (J4800) is placed on the MLB.
Right sensor is placed on the audio side.

If problem appeared after software upgrade, should be better to test reinstalling original macOS; start recovery with Shift+Command+Option+R.
